snippet.title: Mythic | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Mythic is a unique fusion of the roguelike and online rpg genres, with an emphasis on true exploration. Navigate a procedurally generated maze world with hundreds of handcrafted items, powerful bosses, and intriguing puzzles.

Mythic will release on Steam in Early Access in 2022 and will support Windows, MacOS, Linux, and Steam Deck at launch.

You can add Mythic to your wishlist here: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1752260/Mythic/

Twitter         ►  https://twitter.com/Play_MythicGame
Discord        ► https://discord.gg/mythicgame
Linktree       ►  https://linktr.ee/MythicGame
